column5: looking for a quiet affordable get away in Austin...This Quiet and cute east Austin House located 20-30 minutes from south, Central, and north Austin. And just 10-15 min away from airport and race track. New home with new amenities. Especially stays cool in summer with concrete floors. Nice light from windows and 2 charming porches to watch the big beautiful sunrise or sunsets of the vast Texas sky and relax. If the time right, you can also hear the coyotes.
